timeline.message:
Vert.x event-loop threads start as "vert.x-eventloop-thread-"

This typo causes a bug where blocking checks fail when run on a Vert.x event-loop.

timeline.bodyText: Couldn't we have a constant in Vert.x or an API to test that?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: No, because this would add dependency from this extension to Vert.x core. I had initially tried writing the test with Vert.x APIs, but that didn't work here.
replies.author: jponge

replies.bodyText: Note that this naming scheme has been consistent over the years and is not changing anytime soon.
replies.author: jponge

replies.bodyText:
We want to avoid having an explicit dependency on Vert.x. I believe there is a comment about that.
That being said, we can create a constant.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.message: Extract the Vert.x loop thread prefix as a constant
